quickTasks.wellOnWay: üéâ E»ôti pe cale sƒÉ asiguri viitorul familiei tale!

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Legacy Dashboard
welcome.description: This is your central hub for protecting your family's future. Let us show you around the key features that will help you sleep better at night.
welcome.tip1: This guide will only show once, but you can access help anytime
welcome.tip2: Each section is designed to be completed in small, manageable steps
welcome.tip3: You're in control - skip any section and come back later

progress.title: Your Progress Tracker
progress.description: This shows your overall protection level and current stage. As you complete tasks, you'll see your progress grow from Foundation through Legacy stages.
progress.tip1: Focus on critical tasks first - they have the biggest impact
progress.tip2: Each stage builds on the previous one for comprehensive protection

stages.title: Protection Journey Stages
stages.description: Your journey has five clear stages: Foundation, Buildout, Reinforcement, Advanced Planning, and Legacy. Each stage represents important milestones in securing your family's future.
stages.tip1: Foundation Stage (0-25%): Essential information and contacts
stages.tip2: Buildout Stage (25-60%): Assets, beneficiaries, and guardians
stages.tip3: Reinforcement Stage (60-75%): Will creation and access verification

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
recommendations.description: Based on your progress, we'll suggest the most impactful next steps. These recommendations adapt as you complete tasks, always showing you the best path forward.
recommendations.tip1: Red badges indicate critical tasks that need immediate attention
recommendations.tip2: Each recommendation shows time estimate and impact

firstTimeGuide.importantNote: Remember: You can always access detailed help and support from the navigation menu

progressTracking.title: Your Protection Progress
progressTracking.subtitle: Track your journey to complete family protection

buildout.name: Buildout
buildout.description: Expanding your protection with assets and guardians

criticalGaps.title: Critical Gaps
criticalGaps.description: Address these items to strengthen your protection

recommendations.title: Recommended Next Steps
recommendations.subtitle: Personalized actions to strengthen your family's protection

emergencyContacts.title: Add Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.description: Essential people your family should contact first
emergencyContacts.impact: Your family will know exactly who to call in emergencies

keyDocuments.title: Upload Key Documents
keyDocuments.description: Insurance policies, IDs, and critical paperwork
keyDocuments.impact: Prevents days of searching for important papers

assetInventory.title: Create Asset Inventory
assetInventory.description: List your bank accounts, properties, and valuables
assetInventory.impact: Ensures nothing is lost or forgotten

beneficiaries.title: Designate Beneficiaries
beneficiaries.impact: Prevents family conflicts and ensures your wishes are followed

will.title: Create Your Will
will.impact: Provides legal clarity and peace of mind for your family

accessVerification.title: Verify Guardian Access
accessVerification.description: Test that your guardians can access information
accessVerification.impact: Ensures your system works when it's needed most

annualReview.title: Complete Annual Review
annualReview.description: Update your information to reflect life changes
annualReview.impact: Keeps your protection plan current and effective
